=== (*) Notes and recipes ===
* Ubuntu GNU/Linux 8.10 (Intrepid Ibex): Tested with an USB startup disk created with another computer (original Live-CD).

==== Mic jack ====
* Ubuntu GNU/Linux 8.10 (Intrepid Ibex): Volume too slow with the provided sound recorder.

==== Wireless NIC ====
* Ubuntu GNU/Linux 8.10 (Intrepid Ibex): Download and install the <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/r/rtl8187se/rtl8187se-source_1023.0928.2008_all.deb|driver source package]]</nowiki>, and run '''sudo module-assistant auto-install rtl8187se''' in a terminal.

==== Bluetooth ====
* Ubuntu GNU/Linux 8.10 (Intrepid Ibex): Detected, but not tested with any peripheral device.

==== Videocamera ====
* Ubuntu GNU/Linux 8.10 (Intrepid Ibex): Run the installation commands of <nowiki>[[http://doc.ubuntu-es.org/Instalar_c%C3%A1maras_Microdia this guide]]</nowiki> for the Microdia webcam.
